TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DocumentsContract/Document extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Constants related to a document, including Cursor column names and flags.

remarks.para: Constants related to a document, including Cursor column names and flags.

A document can be either an openable stream (with a specific MIME type), or a directory containing additional documents (with the #MIME_TYPE_DIR MIME type). A directory represents the top of a subtree containing zero or more documents, which can recursively contain even more documents and directories.
All columns are read-only to client applications.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Display name of a document, used as the primary title displayed to a user.

remarks.para: Display name of a document, used as the primary title displayed to a user. This column is required.
Type: STRING
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Unique ID of a document.

remarks.para: Unique ID of a document. This ID is both provided by and interpreted by a DocumentsProvider, and should be treated as an opaque value by client applications. This column is required.
Each document must have a unique ID within a provider, but that single document may be included as a child of multiple directories.

A provider must always return durable IDs, since they will be used to issue long-term URI permission grants when an application interacts with Intent#ACTION_OPEN_DOCUMENT and Intent#ACTION_CREATE_DOCUMENT.
Type: STRING
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Flags that apply to a document.

remarks.para: Flags that apply to a document. This column is required.
Type: INTEGER (int)
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Specific icon resource ID for a document.

remarks.para: Specific icon resource ID for a document. This column is optional, and may be null to use a platform-provided default icon based on #COLUMN_MIME_TYPE.
Type: INTEGER (int)
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Timestamp when a document was last modified, in milliseconds since January 1, 1970 00:00:00.

remarks.para: Timestamp when a document was last modified, in milliseconds since January 1, 1970 00:00:00.0 UTC. This column is required, and may be null if unknown. A DocumentsProvider can update this field using events from OnCloseListener or other reliable ParcelFileDescriptor transports.
Type: INTEGER (long)
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Concrete MIME type of a document.

remarks.para: Concrete MIME type of a document. For example, "image/png" or "application/pdf" for openable files. A document can also be a directory containing additional documents, which is represented with the #MIME_TYPE_DIR MIME type. This column is required.
Type: STRING
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Size of a document, in bytes, or null if unknown.

remarks.para: Size of a document, in bytes, or null if unknown. This column is required.
Type: INTEGER (long)
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Summary of a document, which may be shown to a user.

remarks.para: Summary of a document, which may be shown to a user. This column is optional, and may be null.
Type: STRING
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Provider.DocumentContractFlags FlagDirBlocksOpenDocumentTree = (32768)

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Provider.DocumentContractFlags enum directly instead of this field.", true)]
[<System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Provider.DocumentContractFlags enum directly instead of this field.", true)>]

Docs.summary: Flag indicating that a document is a directory that wants to block itself from being selected when the user launches an Intent#ACTION_OPEN_DOCUMENT_TREE intent.

remarks.para: Flag indicating that a document is a directory that wants to block itself from being selected when the user launches an Intent#ACTION_OPEN_DOCUMENT_TREE intent. Individual files can still be selected when launched via other intents like Intent#ACTION_OPEN_DOCUMENT and Intent#ACTION_GET_CONTENT. Only valid when #COLUMN_MIME_TYPE is #MIME_TYPE_DIR.

Note that this flag only applies to the single directory to which it is applied. It does not block the user from selecting either a parent or child directory during an Intent#ACTION_OPEN_DOCUMENT_TREE request. In particular, the only way to guarantee that a specific directory can never be granted via an Intent#ACTION_OPEN_DOCUMENT_TREE request is to ensure that both it and all of its parent directories have set this flag.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Flag indicating that a directory prefers its contents be shown in a larger format grid.

remarks.para: Flag indicating that a directory prefers its contents be shown in a larger format grid. Usually suitable when a directory contains mostly pictures. Only valid when #COLUMN_MIME_TYPE is #MIME_TYPE_DIR.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Flag indicating that a document is not complete, likely its contents are being downloaded.

remarks.para: Flag indicating that a document is not complete, likely its contents are being downloaded. Partial files cannot be opened, copied, moved in the UI. But they can be deleted and retried if they represent a failed download.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Flag indicating that a document supports writing.

remarks.para: Flag indicating that a document supports writing.

When a document is opened with Intent#ACTION_OPEN_DOCUMENT, the calling application is granted both Intent#FLAG_GRANT_READ_URI_PERMISSION and Intent#FLAG_GRANT_WRITE_URI_PERMISSION. However, the actual writability of a document may change over time, for example due to remote access changes. This flag indicates that a document client can expect ContentResolver#openOutputStream(Uri) to succeed.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

remarks.para: Flag indicating that a document is virtual, and doesn't have byte representation in the MIME type specified as #COLUMN_MIME_TYPE.
Virtual documents must have at least one alternative streamable format via DocumentsProvider#openTypedDocument
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
